mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "BP"."RESERVATION" (USER_EMAIL, SHOP_TITLE, RES_DATE, RES_CUSTOMER, SHOP_ID,RESERVE_IDX,REV_PHONE,RES_NAME ) VALUES (#{vo.user_email},#{vo.shop_title},TO_DATE(#{res_date}, 'YYYY/MM/DD hh24:mi:ss'),#{vo.res_customer},#{vo.shop_id},SEQ_RESERVE_IDX.NEXTVAL,#{vo.rev_phone},#{vo.res_name})
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET ALERT_NEW = '0' WHERE SHOP_ID = #{shop_id}
mapper.select: select r.res_name,r.res_customer,r.reserve_idx,r.rev_phone,TO_char(r.res_date,'MM-DD HH24:MI') as res_date from reservation R inner join shopUser U on U.user_email=R.user_email inner join Shop S on S.shop_title = R.shop_title where R.shop_id= #{shop_id} AND TO_Char(R.res_date,'MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')>TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY res_date asc
